verses.verse: Then <S%H6691>Zophar<s%> the <S%H5284>Naamathite<s%> <S%H6030>answered,<s%>
<S%H3651>"Therefore<s%> my <S%H9620>disquieting<s%> <S%H9620>thoughts<s%> make me <S%H7725>respond,<s%> Even <S%H5668>because<s%> of my inward <S%H2363>agitation.<s%>
"I <S%H8085>listened<s%> to the <S%H4148>reproof<s%> which <S%H3639>insults<s%> me, And the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of my <S%H998>understanding<s%> makes me <S%H6030>answer.<s%>
"Do you <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H384>this<s%> from of <S%H5703>old,<s%> From the <S%H7760>establishment<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> on <S%H776>earth,<s%>
That the <S%H7445>triumphing<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is <S%H7138>short,<s%> And the <S%H8057>joy<s%> of the <S%H2611>godless<s%> <S%H5704>momentary<s%> <S%H7281><s%>?
<S%H518>"Though<s%> his <S%H7863>loftiness<s%> <S%H5927>reaches<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> And his <S%H7218>head<s%> <S%H5060>touches<s%> the <S%H5645>clouds,<s%>
He perishes <S%H6>forever<s%> like his <S%H5331>refuse;<s%> Those who have <S%H1561>seen<s%> him will <S%H7200>say,<s%> <S%H559>'Where<s%> is he?'

"He <S%H5774>flies<s%> <S%H5774>away<s%> like a <S%H2472>dream,<s%> and they <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H4672>find<s%> him; Even like a <S%H2384>vision<s%> of the <S%H3915>night<s%> he is <S%H5074>chased<s%> <S%H5074>away.<s%>
"The <S%H5869>eye<s%> which <S%H7805>saw<s%> him sees him <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3254>more,<s%> And his <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>longer<s%> <S%H7789>beholds<s%> him.
"His <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H7521>favor<s%> the <S%H1800>poor,<s%> And his <S%H3027>hands<s%> <S%H7725>give<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> his <S%H202>wealth.<s%>
"His <S%H6106>bones<s%> are <S%H4390>full<s%> of his <S%H5934>youthful<s%> <S%H5934>vigor,<s%> But it <S%H7901>lies<s%> <S%H7901>down<s%> with him in the <S%H6083>dust.<s%>
<S%H518>"Though<s%> <S%H9567>evil<s%> is <S%H4985>sweet<s%> in his <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> [And] he <S%H3582>hides<s%> it <S%H8478>under<s%> his <S%H3956>tongue,<s%>
[Though] he <S%H2550>desires<s%> it and will not <S%H5800>let<s%> it <S%H5800>go,<s%> But <S%H4513>holds<s%> it in his <S%H2441>mouth,<s%>
[Yet] his <S%H3899>food<s%> in his <S%H4578>stomach<s%> is <S%H2015>changed<s%> To the <S%H4846>venom<s%> of <S%H6620>cobras<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> him.
"He <S%H1104>swallows<s%> <S%H2428>riches,<s%> But will <S%H9513>vomit<s%> them up; <S%H410>God<s%> will <S%H3423>expel<s%> them from his <S%H990>belly.<s%>
"He <S%H3243>sucks<s%> the <S%H7219>poison<s%> of <S%H6620>cobras;<s%> The viper's <S%H3956>tongue<s%> <S%H2026>slays<s%> him.
"He does not <S%H7200>look<s%> at the <S%H6390>streams,<s%> The <S%H5104>rivers<s%> <S%H5158>flowing<s%> with <S%H1706>honey<s%> and <S%H2529>curds.<s%>

"He <S%H7725>returns<s%> <S%H3022>what<s%> he has <S%H3022>attained<s%> And <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H1104>swallow<s%> [it;] As to the <S%H2428>riches<s%> of his <S%H8545>trading,<s%> He <S%H3808>cannot<s%> even <S%H5965>enjoy<s%> [them.]
"For he has <S%H7533>oppressed<s%> [and] <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> the <S%H1800>poor;<s%> He has <S%H1497>seized<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> which he has not <S%H1129>built.<s%>
<S%H3588>"Because<s%> he <S%H3045>knew<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H7961>quiet<s%> <S%H990>within<s%> him He does not <S%H4422>retain<s%> anything he <S%H2530>desires.<s%>
<S%H369>"Nothing<s%> <S%H8300>remains<s%> for him to <S%H398>devour,<s%> <S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> his <S%H2898>prosperity<s%> does not <S%H2342>endure.<s%>

"In the <S%H4390>fulness<s%> of his <S%H8231>plenty<s%> he will be <S%H9503>cramped;<s%> The <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3605>everyone<s%> <S%H9416>who<s%> <S%H9416>suffers<s%> will <S%H935>come<s%> [against] him.

"When he <S%H4390>fills<s%> his <S%H990>belly,<s%> [God] will <S%H7971>send<s%> His <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> on him And will <S%H4305>rain<s%> [it] on him while he is <S%H3894>eating.<s%>
"He may <S%H1272>flee<s%> from the <S%H1270>iron<s%> <S%H5402>weapon,<s%> [But] the <S%H5154>bronze<s%> <S%H7198>bow<s%> will <S%H2498>pierce<s%> him.

"It is <S%H8025>drawn<s%> <S%H8025>forth<s%> and <S%H3318>comes<s%> out of his <S%H1465>back,<s%> Even the <S%H1300>glittering<s%> <S%H1300>point<s%> from his <S%H4845>gall.<s%> <S%H367>Terrors<s%> <S%H1980>come<s%> upon him,

<S%H3605>Complete<s%> <S%H2822>darkness<s%> is <S%H2934>held<s%> in <S%H2934>reserve<s%> for his <S%H6845>treasures,<s%> And <S%H5301>unfanned<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> will <S%H398>devour<s%> him; It will <S%H7462>consume<s%> the <S%H8300>survivor<s%> in his <S%H168>tent.<s%>
"The <S%H8064>heavens<s%> will <S%H1540>reveal<s%> his <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> And the <S%H776>earth<s%> will <S%H6965>rise<s%> up against him.
"The <S%H2981>increase<s%> of his <S%H1004>house<s%> will <S%H1540>depart;<s%> [His possessions] will <S%H5064>flow<s%> away in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of His <S%H639>anger.<s%>
<S%H2088>"This<s%> is the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> man's <S%H2506>portion<s%> from <S%H430>God,<s%> Even the <S%H5159>heritage<s%> <S%H561>decreed<s%> to him by <S%H410>God.<s%>"
